00028 class XQGLWidget: public QGLWidget {
00029     Q_OBJECT
00030 
00031     public:
00032         XQGLWidget (QWidget * = 0);
00033         bool SetDrawObject (GLObject *obj) {
00034             DrawObject = obj;
00035             return *DrawObject;
00036         }
00037         bool SetDrawObject (GLuint list) {
00038             DrawObject = new GLObject (list);
00039             return *DrawObject;
00040         }
00041 
00042         void SetBackgroundColor (const VecMath::Vector<4> &RGBA) { Background = RGBA; }
00043 
00044         void SetBackgroundColor (float R, float G, float B, float A) {
00045             Background = VecMath::Vector<4> (R, G, B, A);
00046         }
00047 
00048     public slots:                               //  called when:
00049         void ViewPos (double, double, double);  //  - viewing angle is changed
00050         void ViewPos (double);                  //  - distance of viewpoint is changed
00051 
00052     protected:                                  //  OpenGL interface
00053         void initializeGL (void);

00056         void Draw (void);
00057 
00058         void InitLight (void);

00061         void InitTransparence (void);
00062 
00063     protected:
00064         GLObject *DrawObject;
00065         //  geometry states
00066         double R,                       //  viewpoint distance
00067                psi, theta, phi;         //  rotation about x-, y- & z-axis
00068                VecMath::Vector<4> Background;
00069         GLfloat Alpha;
00070 
00071         //  drawing realism states
00072         bool light, fog, transparent, shade, colors;
00073 
00074     protected:
00075         void mousePressEvent (QMouseEvent *);
00076         void mouseReleaseEvent (QMouseEvent *);
